price: Аллахове су војске небеса и Земље; Аллах је силан и мудар.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ جُنُودُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمًا

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walillahi junūdu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wakāna al-lahu ʿazīzan ḥakīman
